app.greetings: Hi, I'm Deiziane - a frontend developer currently based in Minas Gerais, Brazil.
app.sanar.description: Worked on creating the initital setup of the web project defining patterns, architecture, unit and E2E tests strategy. Also worked on creating a component library
app.tw.description: Participated during four weeks of intense agile training in India, working with a team under the guidance of experienced ThoughtWorkers. Learned agility concepts, consultant skills and best development practices like Pairing, TDD, Refactoring, Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI & CD).
